title: Beautiful girl in white dress
body: To the girl with dazzling brown eyes, I think we locked glances. Do we want to make this happen?

title: Indigo T-Shirt, Guitar Case
body: You walked into the building wearing a guitar case and a purple-ish t-shirt. Sorry I was too shy to say hi! Hope we can talk (:

title: You made my day
body: My skateboard was racing away, you (blue eyes, pink hair, hawaii shirt) picked it up. Not going to lie, you're kind of cute (; You want to get coffee sometime?

title: Spontaneous piano player
body: To the guy who pulled out an electric piano and started jamming in public... you might've gotten some pretty weird glances, but you caught my eye (in a good way)
